A circle is a round shaped figure that has no corners or edges.
A triangle is a polygon with three edges and three vertices.
Rhombus is a special type of a parallelogram whose all sides are equal
Heart is a shape used to express the idea of the heart and love in a metaphorical sense.

About Us
Kids Learning App is an AI Based Interactive Application for Kids age of 6 or less, Our Motive is to teach students and help them learn in their early stages with clear concepts.!
